alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Jefferson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 5:11PM CDT until March 26 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... North central Jefferson County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 511 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over St. Joseph, or 27 miles north of Natchez, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Alcorn around 520 PM CDT. Port Gibson around 535 PM CDT. Pattison around 540 PM CDT. Hermanville and Rocky Springs around 550 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southwestern and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
